SurfaceBrush

Apr. â€“ May 2020

Introduction

Mid-air 3D sketching tools in VR like Google TiltBrush enable artists to draw in 3D directly with 3D input. We decided to reimplement our own version of  SurfaceBrush (SIGGRAPH 2019), a paper that presents a method to convert varying-width ribbon-like 3D brush strokes to manifold 3D surfaces.

Overview

1. Related Work
2. Initial Design
3. Low-Fidelity Prototypes
4. Initial High-Fidelity Prototype
5. Final High-Fidelity Prototype
6. Reflection & Future Work

This project was done in collaboration with Selena Ling, Katie Scholl, and Henry Stone.

View the presentation slides  here .

); } } export default SurfaceBrush;
